InputSentence1: Tama felt sad looking at her dandelion-covered lawn.
InputSentence2: Children came to his nursery, and one of them ripped off Tam's dandelion.
InputSentence3: This gave me an idea.
InputSentence4: Before leaving, Tam asked the children to choose a bouquet for their mother.
RandomFifthSentenceQuiz1: She then took her children to Canada.
RandomFifthSentenceQuiz2: The children chose the bouquets.

InputSentence1: All my friends want to go club dancing.
InputSentence2: They think it's fun, and they always invite you to join them.
InputSentence3: Last Saturday, I finally decided to join in.
InputSentence4: I danced terribly and broke my friend's finger.
RandomFifthSentenceQuiz1: My friends decided to keep inviting me because I'm really funny.
